DescriptionTraderList: Here you can find lists of traders.
DescriptionTraderManaging: Here you can manage the traders and their shares.
DescriptionWhiteList: List of traders in wight list.
DescriptionOrangeList: List of traders in orange list.
DescriptionBlackList: List of traders in black list.
DescriptionAddShare: You can create share for traders below.
DescriptionChandeShare: You can change share for traders below.
EmptyName: Your name and surname can't be empty
NameNotLetter: Your name and surname must contains only letter
LongName: Your name and surname might not have longer than 20 symbols together
PhonePlus: Your phone must start with state code (start with +)
PhoneRegion: Your phone must contains region code
ShareIsLetter: Share name must contains only letter
